entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.10.0
entry.content:
ğŸŒŸ Changes in this release:

ğŸš€ Features

  • Add user specific book progress tracking and improve epub progress tracking (#304) by @adityachandelgit
  • Add support for paginated and scrolled modes in EPUB reader (#291) by @adityachandelgit
  • Widen length of metadata fields and add checks in the code (#310) by @adityachandelgit

ğŸ› Bug Fixes

  • Fix EPUB Cover Image Detection (#301) by @afairgiant
  • fix: restore remote auth (#309) by @astappiev
  • Remove unwanted black bar at bottom of EPUB viewer after loading (#307) by @adityachandelgit
  • Fix manage library and admin permissions (#298) by @adityachandelgit

ğŸ“– Documentation

  • Merge Develop into Master for Release (#314) by @adityachandelgit
